name: Paranoia
description:
You let the spectator select a card. They place it back in the deck and give it a shuffle. You then hand the deck to your spectators to shuffle and they do so, to their hearts content. When this is done, the spectator spreads out the deck on the table, face down.

You slowly wave your hand over the sprawled cards- and find their chosen one.

No crimps/markings. No forces.

Totally Impromptu. 101% Practical.

Paranoia is great for any magician. Whether you enjoy performing in the street, or you do professional gigs. This is THE effect that your spectators will remember you by. It is so clean, and yet so impossible that this should be in any real magician's repertoire.

If you're still having trouble with Paranoia after purchasing the download, a free1 30 minute lesson will clear up any trouble you may have. 

1Only available for current Learn2Amaze program students in Hong Kong.

In the download:

  • Performance
  • Overview of the sleights
  • The method (including usage of sleights)
  • Performance Tips
  • Final Comments
